description: This file implements server-side functions for processing TCP socket data in an Advanced Networking Service Container component. It provides functions to handle query mode, synchronous and asynchronous processing of incoming data packets for the Ansc Daemon Server TCP Object.

methods.name: ULONG AnscDstoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Determines the processing mode for incoming data based on the worker query. It delegates to the worker's Query method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDstoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes incoming data synchronously by delegating to the worker's ProcessSync method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDstoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Initiates asynchronous processing of incoming data, disables receiving on the socket, and spawns a worker task.
